description: net/http: new server-only, single-connection keep-alive benchmark

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

Anybody?  This is simple, and just a benchmark.

> Reviewers: golang-dev1,
>

>

> Description:
> net/http: new server-only, single-connection keep-alive benchmark
>
> Please review this at https://codereview.appspot.**com/8046043/<https://codereview.appspot.com/8046043/>
>

>   M src/pkg/net/http/serve_test.go
>

LGTM

too many n's in the Read method. how about 'count'?
